授業目的:
Course Objectives
• To equip students with English listening skills
• To provide students with guidance and practice in basic conversation
• To develop students’ academic listening, speaking and presentation skills
• To help students improve their English comprehensibility through vocabulary building exercises
• To improve TOEIC scores
到達目標:
Spring Semester Skills to be Achieved
1. Basic conversation skills
a. Study various speeches and discussions and then summarize the main points in a recorded presentation
b. Use context to acquire the meaning of vocabulary
c. Develop listening comprehensibility through listening activities
d. Listen to a short topic and give your opinion
2. Basic public speaking skills
a. Basic presentation structure
b. Record short discussions on easy topics
c. Use shadowing techniques to develop presentation skills
3. Listening skills
a. Answer questions after listening activities to improve comprehension
b. Shadow listening activities
c. Listen to a short presentation and take notes
授業方法:
1. English is used in class.

2. Preparation before the class is essential.

3. Occasional workshops are conducted

If online learning is scheduled, the course format will be changed. Please follow your teacher’s instruction.By the end of the programme, students should be able to:
• Effectively communicate in spoken English through discussion, debate and presentation, and express their ideas across a variety topics including science related topics
• Obtain adequate levels of listening comprehension through related materials
• Demonstrate a comprehensible level of English pronunciation
